General.Name: Energeia A/S
General.Description: Energeia AS develops, operates, and owns solar PV power plants in Norway and the Netherlands. The company also installs, sells, and services energy equipment and systems. It owns one operational solar PV power plant with an installed capacity of 12.13 megawatts and supplies electricity to approximately 4,000 households in the Netherlands; and manages four operational solar power plants in Italy. The company was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
